Dear Mrs. Schmidt;
4
Thank you for your reply to my letters.
Would you please send a notation of Prof. McLuhan*s
income from the NAEB for 1959, similar to the one you
sent for me. Although he does not have to declare Amer¬
ican income tax for 1959, since the amount was less than
|5,000, he must declare all earnings for that year to
the Canadian Government.
I do have a few other questions to clarify, but I
shall leave them for another letter. Many thanks for your
assistance, Mrs. Schmidt; it is much appreciated.
Sincerely,
I omitted to state that Prof. McLuhan»s earnings for 1959
would be for Oct. 1, Nov. 1 and Dec. 1.
